actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit the provision of photocopying equipment for public use in postal facilities.

summary.text: Permits the installation of photocopying equipment for public use in any postal facility upon a determination by the officer of the Postal Service responsible for the operation of such facility that said equipment is necessary or appropriate. Subjects determinations regarding the necessity or appropriateness of photocopying equipment to review by the Postal General. Specifies procedures to be followed in procuring photocopying equipment for public use in postal facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to permit the provision of photocopying equipment for public use in postal facilities.
